titleInfo.title: ‘MAP SHOWING THE STEAM COMMUNICATION AND OVERLAND ROUTES between ENGLAND, INDIA, CHINA & AUSTRALIA. Drawn & Engraved by J. Walker’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:677 x 1237 m, on sheet 732 x 1296 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:London, Wm. H. Allen & Co., 13 Waterloo Place, S.W.Distinctive Features:Includes two insets: ‘ROUTES between MEDITERRANEAN and RED SEA on an Enlarged Scale’ and ‘ROUTES between MEDITERRANEAN, BLACK SEA and PERSIAN GULF on an Enlarged Scale’.Routes shown in colour with a list of shipping companies and a key at bottom centre.

name.namePart: William H Allen and Company, booksellers and publishers, London
